ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: G-POD WPS server
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: WPS server for Grid Processing on Demand services.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Extraction and Download of EO Products
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the retrieval and publishing of ESA products. The request must specify the date and spatial range together with the dataset name

wps:Process.ows:Title: Download of EO Products - Time Based
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the retrieval and publishing of ESA products. The request must specify the date and spatial range together with the dataset name

wps:Process.ows:Title: Download of EO Products - UK-PAC
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the test of UK-PAC CE.

wps:Process.ows:Title: MERIS Mosaic COM
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the MERIS Mosaic COM G-POD service

wps:Process.ows:Title: MIRAVI Geo
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the MIRAVI service. The request must specify the date and spatial range together with the dataset name

wps:Process.ows:Title: BEAMARITHM
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the BEAMARITHM service

wps:Process.ows:Title: MGVIREGIONAL
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the MGVIREGIONAL service

wps:Process.ows:Title: EnviProjAntarctic
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the EnviProjAntarctic service

wps:Process.ows:Title: fAPAR
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the SSE-Grid fAPAR

wps:Process.ows:Title: GPODTEST
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the GPODTEST service

wps:Process.ows:Title: PF-ASAR (WPS)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the PF-ASAR service

wps:Process.ows:Title: ASAR PF (WPS)
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the ASAR PF service

wps:Process.ows:Title: PHAVEOS WPS
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the PHAVEOS service

wps:Process.ows:Title: SBAS_v2 WPS
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Service access point for the SBAS_v2 service
